Name: TowerHex
About the game: TowerHex is a virtual reality escape game where you and your team set out on a quest to find a missing alchemist. He disappeared while investigating an ancient ritual on crystal energy. Following his footsteps, you will have to climb old castle ruins inside a lava mountain. To get ahead you will have to solve various puzzles and learn to use crystal energy for teleportation. There are also dragons. Game Features * Designed for room scale VR * Suitable for multiplayer * 11 rooms and only 1 hour until time runs out * Magical atmosphere in a fantasy environment * Beautiful graphics and immersive VR gameplay * Various interesting mechanisms and well-designed puzzles throughout the story * Simple controls - one button for overall intuitive gameplay and one button for teleportation Game is built for everyone between age of 10 and 99 without any VR or HTC Vive experience.
